name: Windows Mail Account File
summary: Learn about .OEACCOUNT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OEACCOUNT files are located in the following directory:[user]\​AppData\​Local\​Microsoft\​Windows Mail\​
Windows Mail names OEACCOUNT files as "account{ID}.oeaccount", where "ID" is a unique generated identifier for the user account.
NOTE: Microsoft released Windows Mail in the 1990s and has since replaced it with the Outlook mail program.
